com.openkm.principal

接口 PrincipalAdapter

  • 所有已知实现类:
    DatabasePrincipalAdapter, DummyPrincipalAdapter, LdapPrincipalAdapter, UsersRolesPrincipalAdapter

    public interface PrincipalAdapter

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      java.lang.String getMail(java.lang.String user)
      Method to retrieve the mail from a user.
      java.lang.String getName(java.lang.String user)
      Method to retrieve the name from a user.
      java.lang.String getPassword(java.lang.String user)
      Method to retrieve the user password
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getRoles()
      Method to retrieve all roles from a authentication source.
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getRolesByUser(java.lang.String user)
      Method to retrieve all roles from a user.
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getUsers()
      Method to retrieve all users from a authentication source.
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getUsersByRole(java.lang.String role)
      Method to retrieve all users from a role.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getUsers

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> getUsers()
                                          throws PrincipalAdapterException
        Method to retrieve all users from a authentication source.
        返回:
        A Collection with all the users.
        抛出:
        PrincipalAdapterException - If any error occurs.

      • getRoles

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> getRoles()
                                          throws PrincipalAdapterException
        Method to retrieve all roles from a authentication source.
        返回:
        A Collection with all the roles.
        抛出:
        PrincipalAdapterException - If any error occurs.

      • getUsersByRole

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> getUsersByRole(java.lang.String role)
                                                throws PrincipalAdapterException
        Method to retrieve all users from a role.
        返回:
        A Collection with all the users within a role.
        抛出:
        PrincipalAdapterException - If any error occurs.

      • getRolesByUser

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> getRolesByUser(java.lang.String user)
                                                throws PrincipalAdapterException
        Method to retrieve all roles from a user.
        返回:
        A Collection with all the roles of the user.
        抛出:
        PrincipalAdapterException - If any error occurs.

      • getMail

        java.lang.String getMail(java.lang.String user)
                         throws PrincipalAdapterException
        Method to retrieve the mail from a user.
        参数:
        users - A user id.
        返回:
        The email of the user.
        抛出:
        PrincipalAdapterException - If any error occurs.

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName(java.lang.String user)
                         throws PrincipalAdapterException
        Method to retrieve the name from a user.
        参数:
        user - A user id.
        返回:
        The name of the user.
        抛出:
        PrincipalAdapterException - If any error occurs.

      • getPassword

        java.lang.String getPassword(java.lang.String user)
                             throws PrincipalAdapterException
        Method to retrieve the user password
        参数:
        user - A user id.
        返回:
        The password of the user.
        抛出:
        PrincipalAdapterException - If any error occurs.
